name: Cipactli
description: A medium-sized chaotic evil fiend capable of breathing both air and water, with a serpentine body and many mouths.
memorable: Can transform into liquid to teleport through water and devour foes to immobilize them.
goals: Ambushing and consuming unsuspecting creatures, particularly in aquatic environments.
relations: Related to other fiends and aquatic predators.
strengths: High mobility in water and land, effective stealth capabilities.
attacks: Multiattack with bites that can grapple and consume targets, dealing significant damage over time.
most_powerful_ability: Ancient Lullaby, which can incapacitate multiple foes with its soothing song.
senses: Possesses darkvision and keen stealth ability while submerged.
skills: Highly proficient in stealth, especially when underwater.
additional_information: Has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks while submerged.
Immune to cold and poison damage.
Can teleport through water using Water Step ability.
Devouring Embrace can blind and restrain opponents.
test_queries: mobile aquatic fiend with devouring attacks
stealthy creature that can teleport through water
chaotic fiend that consumes its victims
monster that lulls creatures to sleep
multitude of mouths on a medium fiend
